bug.short_desc: NumberFormat parse() function is not working properly

long_desc.thetext:
The spinner behaves strange if the comma is visible and if we try to delete or add some numbers. Here is a small example. If you type in (for example) "12345" and then click outside, you get this: "12,345" (this is ok). But now, if I delete for example "5", then I get "12" instead of "1,234". The same problem occurs if we try to add a number, for example we have "12,345" and then we add "6". We get "12" instead of "123,456".
http://goo.gl/g0umcW
The problem lies in the qx.util.format.NumberFormat class, function parse().
